scenario.name: Conference Logistics Action
scenario.description: Tests whether corrected planning facts are converted into a correct action checklist.
steps: We are finalizing logistics for the Q2 Product Summit breakfast event.
Initial plan: venue Hall A, expected headcount 90.
Correction: event moved to Hall C, not Hall A.
Correction: updated headcount is 120 attendees, not 90.
Dietary counts are 14 vegan and 9 gluten-free meals.
Payment terms: submit $1,800 deposit before Friday 4:00 PM.
Correction: use budget code OPS-19, not MKT-77.
Reminder: include a final confirmation message to Sunrise Catering.
Ignore this note: office plant watering moved to Tuesdays.
Ignore this note: team hoodie order approved for next month.
scenario.finalQuestion: Give a concise 4-step action plan with exact values we should execute now.

strategies.finalAnswer:
- Step 1: Update event setup
  - Venue: Hall C
  - Headcount: 120
  - Dietary counts: Vegan 14; Gluten-free 9; Standard 97
  - Catering vendor: Sunrise Catering
  - Budget code: OPS-19

- Step 2: Confirm catering order with Sunrise
  - Breakfast service for 120
  - Meals by dietary: 14 vegan, 9 gluten-free, 97 standard
  - Delivery/setup to Hall C

- Step 3: Process deposit payment
  - Amount: $1,800
  - Deadline: by Friday 4:00 PM
  - Budget reference: OPS-19
  - Include deposit reference in payment

- Step 4: Send final confirmation to Sunrise Catering
  - Include: event name (Q2 Product Summit Breakfast), venue Hall C, headcount 120, dietary counts (14 vegan, 9 gluten-free, 97 standard), service type (breakfast), budget OPS-19, deposit deadline (Friday 4:00 PM)
  - Request receipt/confirmation and any menu/setup notes.

1) Catering update
- Update Sunrise Catering order: total 120 meals; 14 vegan; 9 gluten-free; 97 standard.

2) Deposit/payment
- Submit $1,800 deposit due Friday 4:00 PM; budget code OPS-19; reference Q2 Product Summit breakfast.

3) Documentation & logistics
- Update internal records: Venue Hall C; Headcount 120; Dietary counts 14 vegan, 9 gluten-free; Budget OPS-19; circulate to stakeholders.

4) Final confirmation to Sunrise Catering
- Send the following message to Sunrise Catering:
  Subject: Q2 Product Summit breakfast â€“ Final Confirmation
  Body:
  Hello Sunrise Catering Team,
  Event: Q2 Product Summit breakfast
  Venue: Hall C
  Headcount: 120
  Dietary: 14 vegan, 9 gluten-free, 97 standard
  Deposit: $1,800 due Friday 4:00 PM
  Budget code: OPS-19
  Please confirm receipt and that the order is set.
  Best regards,
  [Your Name]
